Package controller

Class CustomerMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CustomerMenuController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class CustomerMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class adds and controls all the functionality of the Customer Menu.

    • Method Detail

      • onActionModifyCustomer

        public void onActionModifyCustomer()
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Populates the test fields in that make up the form based on selection from the table view. Finds the match between Division Name and Division ID assigned to the Customer. Once user has updated any necessary information this function performs the update statement
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if exception has occurred

      • onActionSaveCustomer

        public void onActionSaveCustomer()
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Inserts the new Customer into the Database based on the information provided in the Text Fields and Comboboxes.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if exception has occurred

      • addCustomerDataToTable

        public void addCustomerDataToTable()
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds the Customers saved on the Database to the Table View.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if exception has occurred

      • clearData

        public void clearData()
        Resets text fields and comboboxes after performing a Save or an Update.

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        This method initializes the AddCustomerController.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - The url is used to find the relative paths for the root object.
        resourceBundle - The resource bundle is used to localize the root object. Lambda 1: The goal of this lambda expression is to add Contact Names and Division names to the Combobox in a more simple way.

      • lambdaConsoleNotification

        public void lambdaConsoleNotification()
        Lambda 2 The purpose of this lambda expression is to communicate to the user that the adding or updating action they performed has been successful.

      • changeNotification

        public java.lang.String changeNotification​(java.lang.String string,

        Lambda 2 Reference: Function to simplify code while Saving and Modifying customers.
        Parameters:
        string - Customer
        fn - Finishes the notification based on wether a new Customer was added or one was Modified.

        Notification based on button selected
